allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Sprint 1 & 2 - Foundation & User Management

Sprint 1 - Solution Architecture & Infrastructure:
- Clean Architecture with Domain, Application, Infrastructure, API layers
- ASP.NET Core 8 with Entity Framework Core 8 and SQL Server LocalDB
- ASP.NET Core Identity with custom ApplicationUser/ApplicationRole
- JWT Bearer Authentication with refresh tokens
- CQRS pattern with MediatR
- FluentValidation for request validation
- Permission-based authorization system
- Financial-grade audit logging
- Database seeding with roles, permissions, and admin user

Sprint 2 - Enterprise User Management:
- Users CRUD \(GetUsers, GetUserById, CreateUser, UpdateUser, DeleteUser\)
- User Profile management \(GetProfile, UpdateProfile\)
- User Settings/Preferences management \(GetSettings, UpdateSettings\)
- User Sessions management \(GetSessions, RevokeSession\)
- UsersController for admin user management
- MeController for current user operations
- Soft delete pattern for users
- Pagination with filtering and sorting

API Endpoints:
- POST /api/auth/login, /api/auth/register, /api/auth/refresh-token
- GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/users \(admin\)
- GET/PUT /api/me/profile, /api/me/settings
- GET/DELETE /api/me/sessions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Sprint 3 - Student Management

Sprint 3 Implementation:

Domain Entities \(Academic\):
- Student entity with comprehensive fields \(personal, contact, address, academic, emergency contact\)
- Department entity for academic departments
- Program entity for degree programs \(Bachelor''s, Master''s, etc.\)
- Course entity with credit hours, prerequisites
- CourseSection entity for class scheduling
- Term entity for academic terms/semesters
- Enrollment entity for course registration tracking
- StudentDocument entity for document management
- ProgramCourse and CoursePrerequisite junction entities

Enums:
- StudentStatus \(Applicant, Admitted, Active, OnLeave, Suspended, Withdrawn, Dismissed, Graduated\)
- StudentType \(FullTime, PartTime, Online, Exchange, Visiting, NonDegree\)
- Gender \(Male, Female, Other, PreferNotToSay\)
- AcademicStanding \(GoodStanding, Warning, Probation, Suspension, Dismissal\)
- DegreeType, CourseLevel, TermType, EnrollmentStatus, CourseRequirementType, DocumentType

Application Layer:
- Student DTOs \(StudentListDto, StudentDetailDto\)
- GetStudentsQuery with filtering \(status, type, program, department, academicStanding, hasHold\)
- GetStudentByIdQuery
- CreateStudentCommand with auto-generated StudentId \(STU-YYYY-XXXXX format\)
- UpdateStudentCommand with partial updates
- DeleteStudentCommand with soft delete \(checks for active enrollments\)
- FluentValidation for CreateStudentCommand

API Layer:
- StudentsController with full CRUD operations
- Paginated list with comprehensive filtering
- Permission-based authorization \(Students.View, Students.Create, Students.Edit, Students.Delete\)

Infrastructure:
- EF Core configurations for all academic entities
- Proper relationship mappings with appropriate cascade behaviors
- Query filters for soft delete
- Migration for all academic tables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
